content.question: Assume the base year is 2000. If the consumer price index in 2014 was 125, it can be concluded that a typical market basket of goods in 2014 cost

choices.label: 125 percent more than the same basket bought in the base year
125 percent more than the same basket bought in 2013
25 percent less than the same basket bought in the base year
25 percent more than the same basket bought in 2013
25 percent more than the same basket bought in the base year

content.answer: 25 percent more than the same basket bought in the base year

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Interpret a specific economic outcome using quantitative data or calculations.
